title: Malz Ult is Bullshit
body:
It needs to be changed to something more like a WW ult. 9/10 times I use it I get cancelled, even in a 1v1 fight. Even the Yas in my last game was surprised that he was able to cancel my ult so easy.

I try to use it at the right time, throw a W/R combo, but it puts me in range of the enemy who just use some CC and it's gone.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Gintamino Bay,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GqrXoMWU,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-16T13:09:16.177+0000)

> I try to use it at the right time, throw a W/R combo, but it puts me in range of the enemy who just use some CC and it's gone.

Well that's your fault.

I love Malz 

He's the perfect example of a legacy champ overtaken by the change in direction/design on behalf of Riot some time ago. I've never really had any issues of frustration like you are experiencing because I find most of Malzahar's power comes from his E & Q (which mince people with a good chunk of AP) 

Try re-focusing your gameplay into those abilities. 

FOR THE VOID!
WW Ult is even easier to cancel since he goes in melee range of the target...

But ww is gonna be tanky and malz ult isn't high range so he shouldn't be able to pull off a good ult anyway since the enemy team should be able to cc and burst him before he gets a good ult on the enemy carry.
Well I didn't mention anything about how easy it is to kill each of these champions, was talking just about cancelling their ults... rofl but no with a good frontline, Malz will be cray unstoppable.

No even with a good frontline it is pretty easy to handle malz when he ults also he shouldn't even be able to use his ult with on a carry unless it is in the middle of a fight or the carry has horrible positioning.

> [{quoted}](name=CushCush,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GqrXoMWU,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-17T08:40:46.014+0000)
>
> the carry has horrible positioning.

WELL THEN

If you're consistently getting it canceled 1v1 you must be picking very poor times to ult. Especially since most of the time you want to be ulting someone is after you've already hit a q on them and they're silenced. Are you sure you weren't just manually canceling it by using your abilities in the wrong order or something?
Can't you cancel a malz ult the same as ww?

You can, but how the ults work makes it easier to cancel a Malz ult. WW basically warps to his target, therefore dodging anything that was thrown at him. you can see Malz the whole time and can plan to hit him when he ults making it easier in 1v1 to cancel his ult.
I was just thinking that myself...

I think the only truly bs champ in this game is nasus.

Get to late and you win. Thats it. That is just balls.
It's reliable cc (not skillshot based) and it is pretty bursty. He has his weaknesses, yes but he has a strong kit too with low skillcap.
